description:
Camp dinner clean-up, made easy. This portable basin stands solidly so you can wash your dishes, or even yourself, without worrying about getting everything wet. Easy-to-hold handles and a collapsible design let you conveniently transport it, full or empty.

  • Made of 70-denier polyurethane-coated nylon with fully taped seams for complete waterproofness
  • Stainless steel ring keeps rim and broad base from collapsing when full
  • Wide webbing handles are comfortable to hold for carrying
  • Packs down to stow in storage pouch (included)
  • Do not use bleach in this sink. It will damage the coating and fabric
name: Sea To Summit Kitchen Sink
